content: Hold up—are you saying a shovel isn't a weapon?
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持铲子闲聊（日常）-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
Once you've mastered the martial arts principles by heart,
you can turn anything you hold
into a weapon for your ultimate moves— Hoya!
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持铲子闲聊（日常）-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
But, but...
That shovel in your hand
definitely can't be used for fishing.
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持铲子闲聊（日常）-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
You know what they say about weapons,
"The longer the reach, the greater the advantage,"
and that shovel of yours...
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持铲子闲聊（日常）-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
But I've already broken 36 shovels,
and all I've dug up is a bunch of shiny rocks,
not even a single scrap of that martial arts manual!
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持铲子闲聊（日常）-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
There must be secret martial arts manuals hidden in the cave.
That's how it always goes in wuxia novels!
info: 闲聊-关于玩家手持铲子闲聊（日常）-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊
